title: Amazon Cut 50% Off One of Samsung’s Highest-Rated TVs
text:
Samsung knows TVs and you know what you love watching on them. And for a limited time, Amazon is cutting $1,100 off the very highly-rated Samsung 65-Inch QLED 4K UHD 6 Smart TV. That saves you 50% and gives you a serious television. With a focus on contrast, you’re getting a TV engineered to show off the highs and lows of each scene. The design is another focal point, providing a clean and elegant smart TV that gets rid of clutter and helps you hone in on the show. Otherwise, you should note the size and its 4K UHD-enabled tech. And when 700 reviewers leave a TV a 4.4-star average rating on Amazon, you know hundreds of people care enough to share their love of this TV. If you’ve been waiting on a huge improvement to your TV that you can get for Black Friday prices, it just arrived months early. | Get it on Amazon >
